description:
For more than 30 years, our team at Nugent & Bryant has been devoted to providing people in New Haven, Connecticut, with personalized service and zealous advocacy. Our law firm handles personal injury and other civil litigation matters that include the following:

• Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
• Medical malpractice and wrongful death
• Spinal cord and brain injuries
• General civil litigation

Collectively, the attorneys at our law firm have more than 80 years of experience in courtroom and other settings. We recognize that our clients trust us with more than just their case. In some matters, their well-being and financial future is in our hands. We take the responsibility seriously as we develop well-planned strategies to meet their goals.

Our client-focused strategy is why we consistently exceed expectations. It is also why we hold honors that include being selected for inclusion in Connecticut Super Lawyers and in The Best Lawyers in America and holding an Avvo "Superb" rating. Attorney James J. Nugent has earned the highest peer-review rating possible of AV Preeminent* through Martindale-Hubbell.

Nugent & Bryant has the ability to meet with clients virtually, such as over the phone or computer, when in-person appointments are not an option. Our law firm also offers free initial consultations.

* AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
